subject: Re: [junit] UML Junit
msgSnippet: ... The article JUnit: A Cook s Tour includes this. It should be a document that ships with the JUnit package. ... I don t quite understand what you want to
messageBody:
Carolina Franco wrote:
> Hello,
>
> Can you help me with this please...
>
> - I want to extend the frawework of junit....but i
> would like to have the uml class diagram, somebody can
> help me with this please?...

The article "JUnit: A Cook's Tour" includes this. It should be a
document that ships with the JUnit package.

> - I want to separate the test, of the data test...,
> somebody told me that maybe with decorator pattern,
> but i don`t see how to do it...any idea?

I don't quite understand what you want to do here. Could you show us an
example?

Buena suerte.

J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
